response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our esteemed product, valued at $1,200,000 to us, offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that align perfectly with your needs. Given its significant value to you, we propose a fair transaction at a price of $950,000. This offer not only ensures a substantial return for us but also represents a cost-effective investment for you, considering its worth to you is estimated at $800,000. We believe this price reflects a mutually beneficial arrangement. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
